author: mreutegg
msg: OAK-3334: Disable lease check in VersionGarbageCollectorIT

author: rhuijben
msg: In the kwallet code: Initialize the wallet cache once, instead
of every time we get or save a password. Cache the wallet in the
parameter hash and its pool instead of the single invocation pool.
This patch is in response to an issue
(get_wallet): Register pool cleanup handler once, and only when we set
the wallet. Register cleanup on the hash pool.
kwallet_password_set): Don't add another cleanup hook on every invocation.

author: shijh
msg: OFBIZ-6596 The Solr redirection does not work in trunk demo.

1. Use response.sendRedirect to forward url to login page instead of the response.setHeader("location", url), this avoids the warning messages from EntityUtilProperties. Besides, when testing in similar config as demo-ofbiz-trunk is (port 80 -> 8080, port 443 -> 8443), this change can keep the url to 80 or 443.
2. Replace tabs to spaces in several java files.
